effect.x_y: This Pokémon cannot be burned. If a Pokémon is burned and acquires this ability, its burn is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: This Pokémon cannot be burned. If a Pokémon is burned and acquires this ability, its burn is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

flavor_text.x_y: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
